net.openhft.chronicle.queue

Interface ExcerptCommon<E extends ExcerptCommon<E>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.QueryCloseable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExcerptAppender, ExcerptTailer, InternalAppender

    public interface ExcerptCommon<E extends ExcerptCommon<E>>
extends net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.Closeable
    The ExcerptCommon is common to both ExcerptAppender and ExcerptTailer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default File currentFile() 
      E disableThreadSafetyCheck(boolean disableThreadSafetyCheck)
      When set to true this Appender or Tailer can be shared between thread provided you ensure they used in a thread safe manner.
      @NotNull ChronicleQueue queue()
      Returns the backing ChronicleQueue to which this ExcerptCommon is attached to.
      int sourceId()
      Returns the source id of the backing ChronicleQueue to which this ExcerptCommon is attached to.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.Closeable

        close, closeQuietly, closeQuietly, notifyClosing

      • Methods inherited from interface net.openhft.chronicle.core.io.QueryCloseable

        isClosed, isClosing, throwExceptionIfClosed

        Returns the source id of the backing ChronicleQueue to which this ExcerptCommon is attached to.

        @NotNull
@NotNull ChronicleQueue queue()
        Returns the backing ChronicleQueue to which this ExcerptCommon is attached to.

      • disableThreadSafetyCheck

        E disableThreadSafetyCheck(boolean disableThreadSafetyCheck)
        When set to true this Appender or Tailer can be shared between thread provided you ensure they used in a thread safe manner.
        Parameters:
        disableThreadSafetyCheck - true to turn off the thread safety check
        Returns:
        this.

      • currentFile

        default File currentFile()
        Returns:
